author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: The best and worst celebrity isolation videos
description: Entertainment stars have been dealing with staying indoors in their own unique ways.
content:
Just like the rest of us, the world's top celebrities have all been told to stay at home during these strangest of times.
Being natural-born entertainers and creatives, though, many musicians, actors and artists have been keen to share their experiences of s… [+7587 chars]
